Guardian Homes Management works with its partners in managing single family home and multi unit income properties. We manage the properties marketing, leasing, rent collection, tenant communication, evictions, property rehabilitation, repair and ongoing maintenance.

guardianhomebuyersllc.com is a local investment company that purchases single & multi-family properties and land. We buy properties in any price range, in any condition, and in any area. We deal with folks just like you in all kinds of situations, including yours.We specialize in creating win-win solutions for sellers. In fact, we can often give the seller a choice of ways we can buy their house.No matter what reason you have for selling, no matter what condition the property is in, and no matter when you would like to close, we can almost always provide a fast solution. It's what we do.

The K Company Realty, LLC is a nationally ranked vibrant company that’s paved its way as a premier full service real estate firm. Our high level of customer service makes our clients comfortable, our market expertise makes them confident and the results make them smile. Tech savvy, advanced and involved in our industry, we’re often referred as the new way of real estate or the game changers.  We’ve developed the most efficient physical and online platform for agents to operate from allowing them to be more client focused and profitable.  In just the last few years we’ve become the fastest growing firm in Florida and have successfully opened our operation in Colorado.  We’re acknowledged as a Top 50 Broker by sales volume in the state of Florida, established our K Company Cares philanthropy initiatives, received press from the likes of South Florida Business Journal and most recently became a Crystal R Major Investor for the Florida and National REALTOR® Political Action Committee. Our commitment to our community, agents, and industry is evident through our actions.The company delivers a wide range of services and we arm our REALTORS® with all of the resources needed under one roof. With over 900 agents and a broad range of talent, we help people purchase their first homes, investors building their portfolios, businesses leasing space, homeowners looking to redevelop or build new homes and more. Over the years we’ve worked to develop strong relationships with the best mortgage, insurance, title and closing professionals the industry has to offer.  This ensures our clients receive top tier service through the entire process of their transaction.
Assistant Vice President, Division Director of Robert Half Technology Permanenet Placement

I work with passively seeking candidates who are currently working and discreetly looking for their next opportunity. As the Assistant Vice President and Division Director for Permanent Services, I am responsible for managing technology permanent placement on the West Coast of Florida. I personally brought in over 1.2 million dollars of permanent placement fees while managing a team of recruiters that consistently brought in record breaking numbers for the region and the state. I am actively involved in the recruitment, hiring, and daily training and coaching of internal staff. In addition, I help to solidify Robert Half Technology’s presence in the local marketplace through consistent participation in networking organizations and events, including public speaking engagements to assist in educating the work force, job seekers, and raise awareness about proper job search methodology.Founded in 1948, Robert Half International (RHI) is the world's first & largest specialized staffing firm. RHI is a recognized leader in professional staffing & consulting services, and is the parent company of Protiviti, a global consulting & internal audit firm composed of experts in risk & advisory services. RHI is a member of the Fortune 500, the S&P 500, has over 400 offices in 20 countries, & consistently appears on Fortune Magazine's "Most Admired" Lists.

Health Help Project is a non- profit medical assistance organization dedicated to providing hope for the hopeless in impoverished Third World countries. We are a strictly volunteer organization, without any paid staff members. Every penny that is received as a donation to HHP goes to the needy or to the cost of transporting the medical equipment and medicines to the poor. Our organization is staffed by local volunteers in the areas that we service around the world and in our two domestic hubs in Detroit, Michigan and Miami, Florida.Please let me know if you would like to take part in any way with this organization. We are in need of doctors to do medical missionary events in third world countries and the following donations: monetary donations, clothes, toys, canned foods, medical supplies, electronic equipment, Hospital Beds, ambulances, fire trucks, or anything else that may help those who are less fortunate then you.

Mark Mills
CEO / Founder of Yuma Solutions
October 14, 2015, Mark was a client of Jason’s

When my company grew to the point that we needed to proactively hire people instead of organically hiring them we turned to Robert Half.  There we were introduced to Jason and quickly found a partner that would help us find talented people perfectly suited for our environment.  Jason listened to us and mapped out a strategy to find people that could meet the various requirements that our niche company dictates due to our clientele.  This was no easy task yet Jason perfectly delivered on so many quality candidates we found that it was hard to even make choices.  His personal program of customer service calls for proper vetting, prompt time schedules and follow up that goes way beyond what is expected.  Jason has basically taken this business “burden” out of our hands and enabled us to re-focus on what we do best.  Jason is above board with everything and I could not have asked for a better partner for Yuma

I met Jason at a developers' meetup. He was proactively reaching out to individual developers to understand their interests and career aspirations while also learning about the specific language we were focussed on (ruby). summary: REALTOR - I am licensed Florida Realtor with the Pinellas Real Estate Organization with access to nationwide listings as well as the Mid Florida Multiple Listing Service. I market homes for sale and I find homes for qualified home buyers. I specialize in finding income properties for my clients to buy with their cash assets or their 401K funds. Real Estate Investor, Vacation Rental Consultant - We invest in 2-4 multi-unit income properties in current areas of gentrification which have the ability to rent on a daily, weekly or monthly through yearly basis in compliances with city ordinances. Property Manager, Landlord - I invest with my clients in the income properties we identify and manage the properties marketing, leasing, rent collection, tenant communication, evictions, property rehabilitation, repair and ongoing maintenance. Flipper - We buy and sell single and multi family homes by structuring several options including all cash offers and letting you choose the one that fits your needs. We work with distressed properties, sellers who need cash fast, sellers in foreclosure and probate attorneys.Rehab Specialist - I rehabilitate distressed and income properties to maximize return on investment. This entails identifying the best enhancement for the return, pitching the costs to investment partners and managing the construction projects, contractors and permits.
name: Jason Patino
title: REALTOR - Real Estate Investor - Vacation Rental Consultant - Property Manager - Landlord - Flipper - Rehab Specialist
